item.title: Pokemon GO Halloween 2024 Part 1: All Free, Timed & Field Research Task & Rewards
item.description:
Pokemon GO 's much anticipated Halloween Part 1 event is here, and fans are eagerly looking forward to catching some new Pokemon, taking part in various Field and Timed Research, and gaining some valuable rewards on the way.

The Halloween Update has been one of Niantic's biggest events every year, and the outline of the event doesn't disappoint this year as well. Here are the complete details of the Halloween 2024 event in Pokemon GO for players who are taking part in it.

All Field Research Tasks & Rewards

Catch 10 Ghost or Dark‑type Pokemon

Sandygast, Nymble

Catch 15 Ghost‑ or Dark‑type Pokemon

  • Gengar Mega Energy x25
  • Houndoom Mega Energy x25
  • Sableye Mega Energy x25
  • Banette Mega Energy x25
  • Absol Mega Energy x25

Make 108 Curveball Throws

Frillish

Collect 1080 Max Particles

Gastly

Use 108 Berries to help catch Pokemon

Sableye

Step Rewards

Spiritomb, 1080 XP, 1080 Starust

All Spiritomb Challenge Free Timed Research & Tasks

The event gives players a chance to catch a variety of Pokemon for absolutely free. Here are the tasks and rewards for the free Spiritomb Challenge Timed Research.

Catch 108 Ghost- or Dark-type Pokemon

Morpeko

Make 108 Nice Throws

Female Frillish

Make 108 Curveball Throws

Frillish

Collect 1080 Max Particles

Gastly

Use 108 Berries to help catch Pokemon

Sableye

Step Rewards

Spiritomb, 1080 XP, 1080 Starust

All Morpeko Onesie Timed Research Task & Rewards

For players who want to buy a ticket, the Morpoeko Onesie Timed Research isn't a bad option. It gives players a guaranteed chance to get a few costumed Pokemon such as the White Haat Pikachu alongside some handy items. However, players will need to buy a ticket worth $5 to make the most of the available features here. On top of that, some places also need tickets which is very frustrating to handle especially when there are lots of players playing.

Step 1

Catch 5 Pokemon

Lure Module ×1

Spin 3 PokeStops or Gyms

Witch Hat Pikachu

Power up Pokemon 5 times

Silver Pinap Berry ×2

Step Rewards

500 XP, 500 Stardust

Step 2- Full Belly Mode Path

Catch 25 Pokemon

Halloween Costume Froakie

Send 25 Gifts to friends

Spiritomb

Catch 40 Ghost- or Dark-type Pokemon

Sableye

Catch 8 different species of Pokemon

Halloween Costume Rowlet

Use 10 Berries to help catch Pokémon

Morpeko

Earn 10,800 XP

Spiritomb

Step Rewards

Morpeko Onesie (Full Belly Mode), Poffin, Morpeko

Step 3- Hangry Mode Path

Catch 25 Pokemon

Halloween Costume Froakie

Send 25 Gifts to friends

Spiritomb

Catch 40 Ghost- or Dark-type Pokemon

Sableye

Catch 8 different species of Pokemon

Halloween Costume Rowlet

Feed your buddy 10 times

Morpeko

Earn 10,800 XP

Spiritomb

Step Rewards

Morpeko Onesie (Hangry Mode), Poffin, Morpeko

All Costume Party Timed Research Tasks & Rewards

The "Costume Party" Timed Research allows players to catch some exclusive Halloween costumed Pokemon as part of the event. However, there is a catch. This is not free Timed Research, and players will need to buy a ticket for $2 to be able to take part in it. That being said, players will get a chance to catch these Pokemon for free during the second part of the Pokemon GO Halloween event, so it might not be that bad of an idea to skip getting this ticket.

Task

Rewards

Catch 10 Pokemon

Spooky Festival Vulpix

Catch 20 Pokemon

Halloween Piplup

Catch 30 Pokemon

Witch Hat Pikachu

Catch 40 Pokemon

Halloween Drifblim

Use 10 Berries to help catch Pokemon

Spooky Festival Pumpkaboo (Average)

Use 20 Berries to help catch Pokemon

Spooky Festival Pumpkaboo (Large)

Use 30 Berries to help catch Pokemon

Spooky Festival Pumpkaboo (Small)

Use 40 Berries to help catch Pokemon

Spooky Festival Pumpkaboo (Super)

Catch 6 different species of Pokémon

Halloween Costume Froakie

Catch 10 different species of Pokemon

Halloween Costume Rowlet

item.title: Best RTS Games With Nukes
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Real-time strategy games feature unlockable characters and are a pillar of modern gaming.
  • Games like Earth 2150, Total Annihilation, and Rise of Nations introduce strategic planning and nuclear warfare.
  • Sins of a Solar Empire and Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2 feature deadly weapons like nukes for decisive gameplay.

Real-time strategy games are beloved by many players worldwide. While these games are somewhat niche given how complex their combat mechanics are and how they demand players to lay out an attack plan before making their first move, it's undeniable that the genre is one of the pillars of modern gaming.

There are many settings for real-time strategy games, which in turn means that players can encounter many different weapons during their playthroughs. And while commanding various units with smaller, yet efficient weapons is very fun, nothing matches the incredible feeling of turning a nuke on the enemy. Here are some of the best real-time strategy games with nukes.

5 Earth 2150

A Multinational Conflict Between Different Earth Regions

  • Platform(s): PC, macOS
  • Released: June 12, 2000
  • Developer(s): Reality Pump Studios, TopWare Interactive, Zuxxez Entertainment
  • Genre(s): Real-time strategy
  • Players can choose different factions depending on their strategy
  • The Eurasian Dynasty uses nukes as its WMD of choice

Set in the 22nd century, in a very plausible futuristic version of Earth, Earth 2150 presents players with a scenario where, after a long and tiring war, the planet is just starting to recover. Players can use three different factions; the United Civilized States, the Eurasian Dynasty, and the Lunar Corporation. Each one has its own advantages and disadvantages that players must choose and consider carefully to increase their chances of success and emerge victorious from battle.

Earth 2150 features many different possibilities, strategies and weapons for players to take advantage of and implement into their strategic advances. The game features Weapons of Mass Destruction or WMDs, and each faction uses a different one. The Eurasian Dynasty, for example, typically sticks to nuclear missiles as their WMD of choice.

4 Total Annihilation

A RTS Classic With Nuclear Warfare Possibilities

  • Strategic planning is key to ensuring victory
  • Weapons like the Silencer offer great potential for destruction via nuclear missiles

Set several thousands of years into the future, Total Annihilation follows the story of the galactic war between the CORE empire, and the ARM Rebellion. With battles taking place on an interplanetary scale and various moons, this game never fails to provide players with a fun experience that requires a decent amount of planning and a strategic approach. Like other real-time strategy games, this title will put players in control of different units to decide who they want to attack, when, and how.

Total Annihilation features many different weapons, including the all-powerful Silencer, which is a level 3 special tower that attacks by launching nuclear missiles at the enemy. This weapon has a lot of potential for destruction and represents a considerable advantage for any players who get the chance to use it against their foes.

3 Rise Of Nations

Territory Expansion Is Key, No Matter The Cost

  • Several different ages for players to explore
  • Overusing Nuclear Missiles can cause Armageddon

As the name suggests, one of the key elements of Rise of Nations is the expansion of territory and the overall development of players' settlements. Within their territories and borders, players can construct buildings that can help them further advance as a civilization. The game starts in the Ancient Age, set roughly between 10,000-800 BCE and continues through the Classical, Medieval, Gunpowder, Enlightenment, Industrial, Modern, and Information Ages. Each Age has its own features, weapons and possibilities that players can explore as they progress through the game.

One of the main weapons of the Modern Age is the Nuclear Missile, which acts as the nuclear weapon of its time. While having so much power in their hands might be tempting, players must be very careful in how they use their nukes, as overusing them can result in Armageddon.

2 Sins Of A Solar Empire

The TEC's Fearsome Novalith Cannon Is Devastating

  • Players will take part in thrilling space battles
  • Weapons like the Novalith Cannon can decimate enemy forces in a flash

While this title didn't come out in the late 90s to early 2000s, which is regarded by many as the golden era of real-time strategy games, Sins of a Solar Empire delivers an amazing gaming experience requiring tactics and a lot of patience. In this futuristic adventure, players control one of three different races or factions: The Trader Emergency Coalition (TEC), the Advent, and the Vasari.

Players will have to plan out different strategic approaches to survive the arduous space battles that take place throughout the game, and carefully read their opponents to emerge victorious. Sins of a Solar Empire features many different weapons and elements of mass destruction, including the TEC's fearsome Novalith Cannon, which can deliver a deadly nuclear payload to the enemy, resulting in mass casualties and irreparable damage.

1 Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2

Using Nuclear Missile Silos Can Help Turn The Tides Of A Match

  • Players must defend their bases and attack those of their enemies
  • Nuclear missile silos are a great weapon to have, as they can help turn the tides of war

Lastly, there's Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2 , a game known for being one of the classics from the early 2000s. The game focuses on defeating enemy commanders, who can be either controlled by AI or other human players. To win a game, players must focus on destroying enemy bases consistently until reaching the point of being considerably superior. It's also important to focus on protecting friendly bases, as failing to do so can result in defeat. There are many tactics players can take advantage of while playing the game, each requiring focus and strategic planning.

Command & Conquer, Red Alert 2 features nuclear missile silos, Soviet superweapons specifically designed to be very resistant to enemy attacks and capable of unleashing unmatched destruction on the enemy.

item.title: How to Get All Totems in Fisch
item.description:
In the Roblox game Fisch , players can catch dozens of different types of fish. But it's not enough to just visit different fishing spots, as some species only spawn in certain weather conditions and times of day. Fortunately, players can influence the weather with special items called Totems. Without them, it's quite difficult to progress in this Roblox experience. However, finding these items is quite a challenge. So here's how to find totems in Fisch.

What Are Totems in Fisch?

In Fisch , each fish spawns under certain weather conditions. Because of this, one fishing spot can offer you different catches, depending on the fishing time and weather. Players can influence these using Totems, which come in 4 types:

  • Windset Totem: Changes the weather to windy.
  • Smokescreen Totem: Changes the weather to foggy.
  • Tempest Totem: Changes the weather to rainy.
  • Sundial Totem: Changes the time of day.

How to Get Every Totem in Fisch

Each of the Totems in Fisch costs players 2000 Tokens . They can only be purchased in places where these items are located, which are often hidden locations. It is important to note that they are consumables, and after use, the Totems disappear. It is recommended that players buy several at once, so that you don't have to return for Totems every time you need them.

Windset Totem Location

The Windset Totem is located on Snowcap Island in Fisch . It is one of the most hidden, since the path to it is not at all obvious.

Once you reach the island, move deeper until you get a long cave with leaves at the entrance. There, you will find a ladder leading to the ledge. After that, move further along the cave, walking along a narrow ledge until you reach a column. With its help, you will climb even higher. After walking a little further, you will find the Windset Totem.

Smokescreen Totem Location

Unlike the previous Totem, Smokescreen is much easier to find. You just need to visit Mushgrove Island. On the outskirts of the island, near the large rocks, you will find the desired item.

Tempest Totem Location

To get to the Tempest Totem in Fisch , go to Terrapin Island. When swimming to the pier, turn a little left to the rock. There, you will find a glow under the water and an entrance to the cave.

We strongly recommend swimming in a boat halfway to the rock. Otherwise, your character will not have enough breath to swim to the end of the cave. Once you've reached the cave, jump into the water and follow the blue lanterns placed along the cave. When you reach a secret cave, you will find the Tempest Totem next to a skeleton.

Sundial Totem Location

The Sundial Totem is also in a cave but in another location: Sunstone Island. Once there, climb to the top using the ladder. Moving further, you will find several wooden boxes standing on top of each other. From this place, turn right, and you will find the entrance to the cave at the edge of the cliff. At its end, you can find the Sundial Totem and a fishing pond.

item.title: Palworld Studio Pocketpair Looking to ‘Expand’ the IP in the Future
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • The developers at Pocketpair are exploring ways to expand the Palworld IP, including an anime adaptation.
  • While there are no plans for a sequel, Pocketpair is focused on bringing new content updates to enhance Palworld's gameplay.
  • Fans can expect a mobile version of Palworld from Krafton's PUBG Studios, which promises an authentic adaptation.

Pocketpair recently talked about exploring ideas for expanding the Palworld IP. In the same interview, the developers of Palworld spoke about their vision for the game, such as continued support through updates, and addressed what players can expect in terms of new projects related to the title.

Less than a year ago, Pocketpair surprised the gaming world by bringing a monster-collecting, base-building survival game that players nicknamed “ Pokemon with guns.” After all, while Palworld players can catch monsters just like in Game Freak's franchise, it's possible to do more in the game, such as giving weapons to the Pals and putting them to work on a series of tasks. But while Palworld is one of this year's biggest releases, many players wonder what's next.

In a recent interview with TheGamer at the Tokyo Game Show, the Palworld development team said they are looking for ways to expand the title beyond the base game. They talked about the game having many possibilities, and while they didn't give specifics of these possibilities, they did confirm that they are very interested in the idea of adapting Palworld 's universe for anime, specifically. TheGamer also notes that the devs have used the line “each project's needs,” hinting that the game's universe is projected to be expanded into different genres.

Pocketpair Addresses the Future of Palworld as a Franchise

While planning to expand Palworld as a franchise and explore the IP's potential, the studio confirmed that there are currently no plans for a sequel to the game. Instead, the devs are fully focused on bringing new content updates to make the gameplay even more engaging. It's worth remembering that although there is no confirmed sequel, a mobile version of Palworld is on the way, being produced by Krafton's PUBG Studios. Despite the good news, very little is known about the project, apart from the fact that it promises to deliver as faithful and original an adaptation as possible of the original game for mobile devices.

Even though Pocketpair hasn't said any more details about its plans to expand the Palworld IP, the fact that the developers are looking at different ways to grow the game's universe should excite fans. After all, Palworld has a unique lore, and it's interesting enough not only to generate more content for the base game, but also to be adapted into other media, following in the successful footsteps of other franchises such as Minecraft and Pokemon .

item.title: WoW: How To Get Lil'Doomy & Lil'Kaz In The 20th Anniversary Event
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Get Lil'Doomy In WoW's 20th Anniversary Event
  • How To Get Lil'Kaz In WoW's 20th Anniversary Event

World of Warcraft 's 20th anniversary event offers players a chance to celebrate and relive the game's most iconic moments. From October 22, 2024, to January 6, 2025, players can participate in a variety of activities, including a revamped Blackrock Depths raid, and collect new and returning cosmetic rewards. These rewards range from mounts, Battle Pets, and titles to a modernized version of the legendary Tier 2 set for all classes.

Among the new Battle Pets are Lil'Doomy and Lil'Kaz , two adorable doomlords that players can add to their collection. Here’s how to earn these pets during the anniversary event in World of Warcraft: The War Within .

How To Get Lil'Doomy In WoW's 20th Anniversary Event

Lil'Doomy is one of the adorable new doomlord Battle Pets introduced in World of Warcraft 's 20th anniversary event. Players can buy Lil'Doomy from the NPC Historian Ma'di for 10 Bronze Celebration Tokens. Historian Ma'di can be found at the event location just outside the Caverns of Time , in the large center pavilion. Players are limited to only one Lil'Doomy in their collection.

Bronze Celebration Tokens are one of the main currencies for the event, earned by participating in various activities such as:

  • Event Daily and Weekly Quests
  • Anniversary World Bosses
  • Revamped Blackrock Depths Raid
  • Korrak's Revenge Battleground
  • Fashion Frenzy
  • Guest Relations
  • Codex of Chromie
  • Classic Timewalking Dungeons

In addition to Lil'Doomy, players can spend their tokens on other rewards from past anniversaries through Storekeeper Reginald . This includes fan favorites like the Core Hound mount from the 2014 anniversary and the Baby Blizzard Bear from 2008.

The 20th anniversary event runs longer than previous anniversary celebrations, so players have plenty of time to earn the Bronze Celebration Tokens needed for their favorite rewards.

How To Get Lil'Kaz In WoW's 20th Anniversary Event

The other new doomlord Battle Pet, Lil'Kaz , is obtained as a potential reward from killing the returning iconic world boss, Lord Kazzak . Lord Kazzak is located in the Blasted Lands , just west of The Dark Portal.

To reach Blasted Lands, players can use a convenient teleport to The Dark Portal provided by faction-specific NPCs:

  • Alliance: Speak to the Honor Hold Mage located at the entrance of the portal room in Stormwind's Mage Quarter.
  • Horde: Speak to the Thrallmar Mage in the portal room basement in Orgrimmar , just in front of the Shattrath City portal.

Players can kill Lord Kazzak once per day per character, giving those with large Warband rosters plenty of opportunities to try for Lil'Kaz. Unlike Lil'Doomy, players can have up to three Lil'Kaz pets in their collection.
